channel.title: Pug's Class Megathread
channel.description:
I felt like making an easy way to link people to my ideas for classes (includes some other stuff that I think is cool). ## Gamemodes: [Siege on Xed 3.0](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/siege-on-xed-sfol-3-0-main-thread/63502) [Siege On The Xed 2.2.1 (Old)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/gamemode-idea-siege-on-the-xed-2-0-includes-sfol-exclusive-content/50889) [Parallel "I Copied Marl"](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/probably-the-dumbest-gamemode-idea-parallel-universes/62451)
### Classes: still have yet to try an attempt at a serious class ;)
### Partially Inspired By Me: [The Plague Doctor: Credit to Strangler](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/the-plague-doctor-neutral-killer/17275)
### Joke Classes/Factions: [The Methnor](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/new-nk-the-methnor-joke/23810/) [The Carrot & The Rabbit](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/new-neutral-classes-the-carrot-and-the-rabbit-joke-classes/22303/) [The Muffin Faction](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/the-muffin-faction-joke-faction/53505)
### Not by me but are still cool. [The Alfa: Credit to NozBugz](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/new-nk-the-methnor-joke/23810/3) [The Corn: Credit to Luxx](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-corn/3111)

DEUS VULT
